email_text.subject: Manuscript Audit Request
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to an Auditor to request that they accept or decline the task of auditing a submission.

email_text.subject: New notification from {$siteTitle}
email_text.description: The email is sent to registered users that have selected to have this type of notification emailed to them.

email_text.subject: New notification from {$siteTitle}
email_text.description: This email is sent to unregistered users on the notification mailing list.

email_text.subject: Welcome to the the {$siteTitle} mailing list!
email_text.description: This email is sent to an unregistered user who just registered with the notification mailing list.

email_text.subject: Password Reset Confirmation
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they indicate that they have forgotten their password or are unable to login. It provides a URL they can follow to reset their password.

email_text.subject: Password Reset
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they have successfully reset their password following the process described in the PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM email.

email_text.subject: Press Registration
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Validate Your Account
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Registration as Reviewer with {$contextName}
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered reviewer to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: New Book Published
email_text.description: This email is sent to registered readers via the "Notify Users" link in the Editor's User Home. It notifies readers of a new book and invites them to visit the press at a supplied URL.

email_text.subject: Submission Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to an author when he or she completes the process of submitting a manuscript to the press. It provides information about tracking the submission through the process and thanks the author for the submission.

email_text.subject: Submission Acknowledgement
email_text.body:
Hello,
{$submitterName} has submitted the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}" to {$contextName}.
If you have any questions, please contact me. Thank you for considering this press as a venue for your work.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to the other authors who are not users within OMP specified during the submission process.

email_text.subject: Unsuitable Submission
Editorial Assignment
email_text.description: This email notifies a Series Editor that the Editor has assigned them the task of overseeing a submission through the editing process. It provides information about the submission and how to access the press site.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Request
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Management > Settings > Workflow > Review. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST_ATTACHED.)

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Request
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Management > Settings > Workflow > Review, and one-click reviewer access is enabled.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Request
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
I believe that you would serve as an excellent reviewer of the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," and I am asking that you consider undertaking this important task for us. The Review Guidelines for this press are appended below, and the submission is attached to this email. Your review of the submission, along with your recommendation, should be emailed to me by {$reviewDueDate}.
Please indicate in a return email by {$weekLaterDate} whether you are able and willing to do the review.
Thank you for considering this request.
{$editorialContactSignature}
Review Guidelines
{$reviewGuidelines}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to a Reviewer to request that they accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It includes the submission as an attachment. This message is used when the Email-Attachment Review Process is selected in Management > Settings > Workflow > Review. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST.)

email_text.subject: Request for Review Cancelled
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
We have decided at this point to cancel our request for you to review the submission, "{$submissionTitle}," for {$contextName}. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you and hope that we will be able to call on you to assist with this review process in the future.
If you have any questions, please contact me.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to a Reviewer who has a submission review in progress to notify them that the review has been cancelled.

email_text.subject: Able to Review
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Series Editor in response to a review request to notify the Series Editor that the review request has been accepted and will be completed by the specified date.

email_text.subject: Unable to Review
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Series Editor in response to a review request to notify the Series Editor that the review request has been declined.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Completed
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Series Editor to notify them that a review has been completed and the comments and recommendations have been recorded on the press web site.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to confirm receipt of a completed review and thank the reviewer for their contributions.

email_text.subject: Submission Review Reminder
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.

email_text.subject: Submission Review Reminder
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.

email_text.subject: Automated Submission Review Reminder
email_text.description: This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Management > Settings > Workflow > Review) and one-click reviewer access is disabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).

email_text.subject: Automated Submission Review Reminder
email_text.description: This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Management > Settings > Workflow > Review) and one-click reviewer access is enabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).

email_text.subject: Editor Decision
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.subject: Editor Decision
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them that their submission is being sent to an external review.

email_text.subject: Editor Decision
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them that their submission is being sent to production.

email_text.subject: Editor Decision
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Series Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Request
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to request that they begin the copyediting process. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Request Galleys
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that they have been assigned the task of performing layout editing on a submission. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Layout Galleys Complete
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:
Galleys have now been prepared for the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," for {$contextName} and are ready for proofreading.
If you have any questions, please contact me.
{$signatureFullName}
email_text.description: This email from the Layout Editor to the Series Editor notifies them that the layout process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Request Index
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Indexer notifies them that they have been assigned the task of creating indexes for a submission. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Index Galleys Complete
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:
Indexes have now been prepared for the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," for {$contextName} and are ready for proofreading.
If you have any questions, please contact me.
{$signatureFullName}
email_text.description: This email from the Indexer to the Series Editor notifies them that the index creation process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Manuscript of Possible Interest
email_text.body: Thought you might be interested in seeing "{$submissionTitle}" by {$authorName} published in Vol {$volume}, No {$number} ({$year}) of {$contextName} at "{$monographUrl}".
email_text.description: This email template provides a registered reader with the opportunity to send information about a monograph to somebody who may be interested. It is available via the Reading Tools and must be enabled by the Press Manager in the Reading Tools Administration page.

email_text.subject: Submission Notification
email_text.body:
You have a message from {$sender} regarding "{$submissionTitle}" ({$monographDetailsUrl}):
{$message}
email_text.description: A notification from a user sent from a submission information center modal.

email_text.subject: Submission File Notification
email_text.body:
You have a message from {$sender} regarding the file "{$fileName}" in "{$submissionTitle}" ({$monographDetailsUrl}):
{$message}
email_text.description: A notification from a user sent from a file information center modal
